meanings.definition: The outer layer of a pollen grain.
meanings.sent1: The exines protect the pollen grain from harm.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the exines of pollen grains to learn more about plant reproduction.
meanings.sent3: The exines of the pollen grain were so strong, they could withstand extreme weather.
meanings.sent4: The exines acted like a shield, guarding the delicate pollen grain inside.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the exines appeared as intricate patterns, fascinating the researchers.

meanings.definition: The tough outer layer of a spore.
meanings.sent1: The exines of the spore provide protection against harsh conditions.
meanings.sent2: The exines of the spore help it survive in challenging environments.
meanings.sent3: The exines of the spore were so resilient, they amazed the scientists.
meanings.sent4: The exines of the spore were like armor, ensuring its safety.
meanings.sent5: Examining the exines under a microscope revealed their remarkable strength and structure.
